decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a combination of various counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage and maintaining board presence through efficient card draw and creature removal. Additionally, the deck includes powerful synergies with cards like Dream Halls and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, which can provide additional value and utility in different situations. The mana base is also carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to all colors needed to cast the spells in the deck. Overall, the deck is designed to outlast and outmaneuver opponents in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck revolves around assembling various combos using creatures like Felidar Guardian and Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker or Devoted Druid and Vizier of Remedies to generate infinite mana or creature copies. The deck also utilizes cards like Birthing Pod and Eldritch Evolution to tutor for key pieces and create value. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Solitude while also generating card advantage with cards like Skullclamp and Palace Jailer. The mana base is designed to support the combo pieces and ensure consistent casting of spells. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combos while disrupting opponents' strategies to secure a win in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format.

The deck revolves around quickly dealing damage to the opponent using fast and efficient burn spells and aggressive creatures. It aims to control the board with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon while applying pressure with cards like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear. The commander, Feldon, Ronom Excavator, adds additional value to the strategy by recurring threats from the graveyard. By combining direct damage spells with creatures that can attack swiftly, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. With a focus on aggression and burn spells, this deck aims to win the game through sheer speed and relentless pressure on the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures and mana ramp, utilizing various tutors and creature synergies to create a strong battlefield. By utilizing cards like Birthing Pod and Eldritch Evolution, the deck aims to quickly find key creatures like Minsc, Beloved Ranger and Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker to generate powerful combos and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of disruption elements like Blood Moon and removal like Swords to Plowshares helps control the game and protect the deck's strategy. This deck aims to be proactive, applying pressure early on and maintaining a dominant position throughout the game with a mix of efficient creatures and powerful utility spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing Alesha, Who Smiles at Death's ability to bring back powerful creatures with power 2 or less from the graveyard, creating a recurring source of aggression and pressure on the opponent. The deck includes a mix of efficient one-drops and impactful creatures that can be easily reanimated by Alesha, along with versatile removal spells and disruptive creatures to control the board and protect your own threats. Additionally, the deck includes equipment like Skullclamp and Umezawa's Jitte to enhance your creatures and give you more flexibility in combat. By consistently reanimating threats and applying pressure early in the game, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck revolves around controlling the game by utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to disrupt your opponent's strategy. The commander, Eris, Roar of the Storm, provides a powerful and flexible control option to help you stay ahead in the game. With a focus on instant-speed interaction and card advantage, you can outmaneuver your opponent and dictate the pace of the game. By efficiently managing your resources and choosing the right moments to counter or remove threats, you can steadily build up your advantage and secure victory. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of efficient creatures and versatile spells to adapt to different situations and maintain control of the battlefield.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of low-cost enchantments and equipment to buff up creatures, protect them, and disrupt opponents' plans. It aims to create a board state where the commander, Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice, can quickly become a formidable threat with a mix of evasion, protection, and large power boosts. The deck includes a mix of protective spells, efficient removal, and card advantage engines to maintain control of the game while building up a strong offense. By combining a strong creature base with powerful enchantments and equipment, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently, while also having the ability to disrupt opposing strategies effectively.

The deck focuses on a combination of aggressive strategies and controlling elements, utilizing Tevesh Szat and Yoshimaru as commanders to lead the charge. It includes a powerful selection of creatures and spells that can quickly apply pressure on the opponent, while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize, Duress, and Inquisition of Kozilek. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and provide additional utility with cards like Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swift and efficient offense, while maintaining the ability to handle threats and maintain board control.

The deck focuses on controlling the board and manipulating the graveyard through reanimation spells in order to outvalue the opponent over time. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with a variety of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells while utilizing Aminatou's ability to blink creatures for additional value. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures with enter-the-battlefield effects, such as Archon of Cruelty and Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite, as well as powerful combo pieces like Agent of Treachery and Dance of the Dead. By carefully managing resources and strategic timing of spells, the deck seeks to grind out the opponent and establish control of the game.

The primary focus of this deck is to maintain control over the game by using counterspells, removal, and card advantage to outmaneuver opponents. Ertai Resurrected acts as the commander to provide a constant source of removal and disruption. The deck includes a variety of powerful spells such as Cryptic Command, Force of Will, and Demonic Tutor to control the board and disrupt opponents' strategies. Additionally, the deck includes creatures like Baleful Strix and True-Name Nemesis to provide additional value and pressure. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to maintain control of the game through efficient spell usage, disruption, and card advantage to secure victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck revolves around using Lazav, Wearer of Faces as the commander to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and creature control. It focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy by countering their spells, removing their threats, and controlling the board with efficient creatures. The deck also utilizes graveyard recursion with cards like Animate Dead and Reanimate to bring back key creatures or disrupt the opponent's graveyard strategy. The mana base is optimized to support the control strategy with a mix of dual lands and utility lands. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent by efficiently controlling the game and taking advantage of Lazav's ability to become a copy of powerful creatures.
